misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry. With 7 past appearances, his experience is undeniable, and his 2 victories in the team competition speak volumes about his competitive spirit. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his consistent presence underscores his dedication to the sport.

A true sportsman, Daniel embodies the spirit of golf. Despite occasional flashes of temper on the course, he is always a gentleman, offering a respectful nod to his opponents and maintaining composure under pressure. His presence is always appreciated by fellow players.

Although Daniel is not currently slated to participate in the Hector Trophée 2025, the possibility remains that circumstances may change. Golf enthusiasts eagerly anticipate his return to future competitions.
